title: Shadows Below The Marsh
description: Captured!  You and you're captors have been on the move from days.  They move as if something evil chases them.  Must be something horrible, why else would they have trampled into this evil dark marsh.  They seemed to have found a portal jutting out of the waters descending into the murky below and were able to magically open said portal....right when of mad tribalsmen descended upon your party.  Quickly, you stole a fallen dagger, cut your ropes, jumped onto the ladder descending into the dark (shutting the portal lid behind you... **Click**).  Well at least you're free...or are you? [i](Your new life as an adventurer has not started off well to say the least.)[/i]
cover: DONT NEED TO DO THIS - WE CAN JUST SAVE 0-0.JPG IN IMAGES AS THE INITIAL COVER IMAGE
maparraysComments: Each level can have 30 rooms (game ui has 6 rows of 5) - 5x5 squares so 25x25 feet, each level needs to start with the level number and the room number... game keeps track of where the player is and shows the map room they are in as well as all the map rooms they have been in before

rooms.title: The Marsh
rooms.description: You are in a marsh. The ground is wet and squishy. You can see a path to the north.

rooms.title: The Path
rooms.description: You are on a path. The path is muddy. You can see a marsh to the south and a cave to the north.
